physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a valley in Chumba
 Punjab. In the background
 there are several mountain-tops in the distance. The foreground features thick vegetation
 and tall trees along the hill on the right
 with a lone tall tree on the left of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.
